description:
Your real-time scores and stats app, fast and simple.

• As fast as a sports app can be. Get updates in real time with Live Activities on your Lock Screen or on match pages with odds, scores, play-by-play and more.
• Follow teams, leagues, divisions and tournaments, and personalise your home view in the app.
• Add a widget to your Home Screen to get quick access to scores and upcoming schedules.
• The best place to be a fan. Watch live matches on Apple TV or catch up on breaking stories with Apple News when you sync your sports.
• Includes Bundesliga, Bundesliga 2, Champions League, Conference League, EFL Championship, EFL Cup, Europa League, F1, FA Cup, FBS and FCS NCAA College Football, LaLiga, Leagues Cup, LIGA MX, Ligue 1, Ligue 2, Men’s College Basketball, Men’s Tennis, MLB, MLS, NASCAR, NBA, NFL, NHL, NWSL, Primeira Liga, Premier League, Segunda División, Serie A, Serie B, WNBA, Women’s Champions League, Women’s College Basketball and Women’s Tennis.

Requirements:
• Availability and features may vary by country, region or device.
• Apple Sports is free to use and is available for all iPhone models using iOS 17.2 or later.
• Features require internet access over a Wi-Fi or mobile data connection.

Najväčšia komunita tipérov kedykoľvek a kdekoľvek. Užite si nielen vaše online stávky, online kasíno, ale aj live streamy vďaka prehľadnej mobilnej aplikácii Tipsport.

- Široká škála informácií pre LIVE stávky aj predzápasové udalosti na lepšie rozhodovanie pri tipovaní.
- Kompletná ponuka zápasov pre klasické športy, e-športy a mimošportové udalosti.
- Exkluzívne prenosy z hokejových súťaží.
- SÓLO, AKU aj KOMBI stávky a ďalšie možnosti uzatvorenia tiketu.
- Vyššie kurzy na vybrané príležitosti v podobe Akčných kurzov.
- Najlepší cashout na trhu, ktorý umožňuje čiastočný cashout aj jedinečné uzatváranie príležitostí.
- BetBuilder pre futbal a hokej.
- Tím snov s Fantasy ligou.
- Komunita tipérov ponúkajúca analýzy, blogy, tiket arénu, fórum a populárne súťaže.
- Bonusy a odmeny.
- Funkcie na rýchlejšiu prácu s aplikáciou a tipovaním.
- Stávková kancelária vo vašom vrecku aj s lotériou.
- Prepojenie s elektronickou peňaženkou Pluso na nákup kryptomien a prevod peňazí.

MultiSport is now digital!

*Please note that this app is in its early stages. You may encounter temporary issues while visiting facilities and registering visits digitally. If this occurs, please don't hesitate to contact us.

Additionally, once you activate your virtual card, your plastic MultiSport card will no longer be valid.

Switch to a virtual card within the app and use a QR code for check-ins at sports facilities.

Here's how:
1. Create a profile on MyMultiSport, or if you're already registered, simply log in.
2. Verify your mobile number.
3. Upload a picture of yourself.
4. Generate a QR code for digital entry to all MultiSport facilities!
5. Find your sport and the perfect place to stay active!

The app helps you locate all facilities where your MultiSport card can be used.

Explore various sports venues and find your ideal spot to exercise.

Svet tipovania priamo v tvojom mobile. Pridaj sa aj ty k najlepším a užívaj si výhody klubu Niké kedykoľvek a kdekoľvek. Niké je najväčšou stávkovou kanceláriou na Slovensku už od roku 1991. Mobilná aplikácia nabitá funkciami prináša zážitok pre každého správneho tipéra.


KOMPLETNÁ PONUKA TIPOVANIA

Všetky kurzy aj live stávky Niké sú odteraz priamo v tvojom mobile. A dokonca oveľa viac:

• prehľadné štatistiky a analýzy zápasov od profesionálov
• personalizácia ponuky
• virtuálne hry


KOMUNITA

Komunita je komunikačný priestor pre tipérov určený na vzájomné zdieľanie svojich analýz a tiketov v rámci Tiket Arény. Podeľte sa s ostatnými o svoje tipy a názory, chatujte, vytvorte analýzy a buďte odmenení.


LIVE TV PRENOSY

Vo svojom mobile máš s Niké viac ako 40.000 športových prenosov ročne! Tipuj a sleduj úplne zadarmo:

• Niké TV – exkluzívne prenosy, archív, highlighty
• exluzívny obsah z futbalovej Niké ligy
• priame prenosy ATP, WTA, NHL, KHL, NBA či futbalových líg ako Serie A, Primera Division a ďalších
• alebo si vyber RADAR pre dokonalý prehľad o priebehu zápasov


SVET HIER A ŽREBY

Objav nekonečné množstvo zábavy vo Svete hier od Niké! Roztoč to v kasínových klasikách, alebo vyskúšaj niektorú z mnohých tematických hier a strhni šťastie na svoju stranu!


RÝCHLOSŤ A JEDNODUCHOSŤ

Po expresnom prihlásení pomocou TouchID alebo FaceID sa ti odkryje tá najrýchlejšia forma svetového tipovania:

• aplikácia ťa okamžite upozorní na výherné tikety a zápasy tvojich obľúbených tímov
• svoj hráčsky kredit si doplníš jediným kliknutím vďaka ComfortPay

Stiahni si freš vytunenú DOXXbet appku s novými zlepšovákmi. Tipuj svetové aj regionálne športy a zachyť víťazné momenty na Tvojom tikete! Vďaka DOXXbet appke zažiješ adrenalín na top úrovni:
 
- Registruj sa s bonusom až 5000 €    https://www.doxxbet.sk/sk/bonusy-a-akcie/vstupny-bonus
- Získaj aj prvú stávku bez rizika   https://www.doxxbet.sk/sk/bonusy-a-akcie/stavka-bez-rizika
- Čaká Ťa takmer 200 rozšírených možností tipovania
- Kombinuj viacero stávok zo zápasu cez Betbuilder 
- Vychutnaj si live streamy a rýchle vklady aj výbery
- Mrnki sa na Match tracker, štatistiky a bonusy 
 
Stiahni si appku a poď do toho naplno. Čekuj nás aj na sociálnych sieťach, kde máme pre Teba súťaže o fríbety, tutovky a iné tipérske chuťovečky. 
DOXXbet je výhra!

Úplne nová stávková aplikácia v novom dizajne podporujúca iOS funkcie ako Touch ID, Face ID, Push správy alebo 3D touch a ďalšie novinky. Aplikácia umožňuje stávkovať kdekoľvek a kedykoľvek na všetky stávkové príležitosti z ponuky. Vďaka trvalému prihláseniu zadáte svoje prihlasovacie údaje len raz. Stavte si pred začiatkom zápasov alebo aj v ich priebehu Live!
Nevyvíja sa niektorý zápas na tikete podľa vašich predstáv, jednoducho môžete tiket predčasne vyplatiť.
Aplikácia je ZADARMO pre nových aj existujúcich zákazníkov.
 
Aplikácia ponúka všetky typy stávok, ktoré ste si obľúbili na webe: Live stávky, Virtuálne Hry,  SÓLO, AKO, Malú Domov aj Maxikombi! Tiež možnosť využiť z ponuky rôzne kurzové zvýhodnenia jednotlivých zápasov alebo možnosť kombinovať viacero príležitostí v rámci jedného zápasu.
 
Pre nových hráčov ponúkame bonus až 1.000eur alebo prvú stávku úplne bez rizika + free spiny do kasína !
 
Základné funkcie aplikácie:
 
• Kompletná ponuka kurzových stávok vrátane ponuky na Live stávky a Virtuálne Hry
• Jedinečné športové štatistiky a zápasové analýzy
• LIVE streamy - Priame prenosy športových podujatí s možnosťou podania stávok počas zápasov
• LIVE MatchTracker – vizualizácie prebiehajúcich zápasov so živými štatistikami
• Plnohodnotný tiket - všetky funkcie a nastavenia
• Všetky typy stávok - vrátane všetkých parametrov, Maxikombi so všetkými možnosťami nastavení chýb aj skupín
• Možnosť kombinovania stávok v rámci jedného zápasu (BetBuilder)
• Push správy - notifikácie z Vašich tiketov
• Trvalé prihlásenie alebo využitie Touch ID (odtlačok prsta) a Face ID - už žiadne otravné prihlasovanie
• Rýchlostávka - aktivovaná dlhším podržaním tlačidla s kurzom
• Vklady/výbery - dobíjanie kreditu pomocou platobnej karty a ďalších platobných metód
• Prehľad tiketov a transakcií - zoznam podaných aj rozhodnutých tiketov, vkladov a výberov na účte
• Predčasné vyplatenie tiketu - možnosť odpredaja tiketu
• Tiket Zóna a Komunita - možnosť zdieľať svoje tikety a príspevky s ostatnými hráčmi
• Chat pre rýchle poradenie 
• Vyhľadávanie - fulltextové vyhľadávanie v ponuke
• Analýzy - Predzápasové analýzy zápasov
• Pobočky - nové vyhľadávanie pobočiek a navigácia k nim
• Skenovanie pobočkového tiketu
• Svetlý/Tmavý režim
 
Upozornenie:
Aplikácia kontroluje geografickú polohu užívateľov z dôvodu záväzných pravidiel obchodu iTunes firmy Apple Inc. pre stávkové aplikácie.
Pre prihlásenie musíte mať zaregistrovaný účet na www.ifortuna.sk a mať viac ako 18 rokov. Aplikácia je funkčná len s pripojením na internet.

Your ultimate live scores and sports news app. Goals, scores, and stories, all on Flashscore. Follow all the latest highlights across the world of sport, including football, tennis, basketball, hockey and much more. Choose from 30+ sports and 6000+ competitions and our tailored notifications will let you know about every important action of the match. 
 
Download Flashscore now and read the game like no one else!

Key features:
• Fastest live results: Get real-time updates with detailed statistics, xG data, unique player and team ratings, live standings and match updates.
• In-depth sports news: Stay informed with exclusive interviews, transfer news & rumours, and in-depth data analysis.
• Personalized favourites: Receive top news notifications, goal alerts, and customized reminders for your favourite teams, competitions or matches.
• Follow your favourite players: Add them to your list and allow notifications so that you never miss their presence in the starting lineup, goals, bookings or ratings.
• Expert match previews: Access selected opportunities and stats to enhance your sports prediction accuracy.
• Predicted lineups: Stay one step ahead and find out who is likely to start in the upcoming match given current form, unexpected injuries or lineup changes.
• Detailed player stats: Check out expected goals (xG), expected assists (xA), the number of shots, passes, touches, chances created, tackles, saves and other key statistics for all the players that appear on the pitch.

LIVE SPORTS SCORES & NEWS, FAST AND ACCURATE

• SPEED: Whether a goal is scored, red card issued, set or period is over, you will know at the same time as the live audience.

• DATA-DRIVEN NEWS: Breaking news and detailed coverage with unique sports data visualizations, tactical insights, expert opinions or featured articles.

• GREAT COVERAGE: You can find football live scores, tennis scores, basketball results, hockey online, golf leaderboard and more than 30 other sports (snooker, baseball, MMA ...) in our app. 


Coverage of major global events & local competitions: 
Football: Premier League, Championship, League One, League Two, FA Cup, LaLiga, Serie A, Bundesliga, Champions League (UCL), Europa League, Europa Conference League, Club World Cup
Tennis: ATP/WTA Tour tournaments including Grand Slams (Australian Open, French Open, Wimbledon, US Open), ATP Finals, Davis Cup
Basketball: NBA, Euroleague, ACB, LNB, Lega A, World Cup
Hockey: NHL, DEL, SHL, IIHF World Championship
Darts: PDC World Championship, Premier League Darts, PDC Grand Slam, World Matchplay, UK Open, World Grand Prix
Golf: British Open (The Open), Masters, US Open, PGA Championship, Ryder Cup, Players Championship
Baseball: MLB, KBO, NPB, KBO, LVBP, LMB, World Baseball Classic
Snooker: World Championship, UK Championship, The Masters
Volleyball: SuperLega, Nations League, Nations League Women, CEV Champions League
Badminton: BWF World Championships, Thomas Cup, Uber Cup, Sudirman Cup
Darts: PDC World Championship, Premier League Darts, PDC Grand Slam
Motorsport: Formula 1 (F1), MotoGP, Moto2, Nascar, Dakar
MMA: UFC, Bellator MMA, KSW, Оktagon MMA, PFL, ONE Championship


NO MORE MISSED MATCHES OR UPDATES

• FAVOURITE TEAMS AND MATCHES: Don’t waste your time, and follow only your favourite matches, teams and competitions.

• NOTIFICATIONS AND ALERTS: Match starts, line-ups, goals - you will not miss any of it again. Just select your favorite matches and wait for your mobile device to let you know.


LIVE RESULTS, TABLES AND MATCH DETAILS

• LIVE COMMENTARY: Unable to watch the match on TV? No problem: stay up-to-date with our detailed live text commentary.

• LIVE TABLES: One goal can change a lot. Our live standings will show you if a scored goal has changed the league ranking, as well as the current top scorers table.


Terms of Use: https://livesport.eu/terms-of-use/en-gb
Privacy Policy: https://livesport.eu/privacy-policy/en-gb

Správa klubu digitálně pod jednou střechou. V Klubovém informačnímu systému najdete vše potřebné na jednom místě!

Díky mobilní aplikaci KIS vám neuniknou žádné novinky z klubu, budete mít vše pohromadě, a navíc vás na vše potřebné upozorní notifikace.

Hlavní výhody:

- Notifikace: Upozornění na vše důležité s možností individuálního nastavení pro každého uživatele.
- Hlavní přehled: Komunikace s týmem včetně možnosti anket, widgety s důležitými informacemi.
- Chat: Individuální i skupinová komunikace mezi členy.
- Kalendář a akce: Tréninky, události, zápasy či závody. Informace o všech klubových akcích včetně evidence docházky.
- Platby: Přehled o platbách, možnost stažení QR kódu pro platbu a potvrzení o zaplacení.
- Zdravotní prohlídky: Evidence zdravotních prohlídek s možností odevzdání, kontrola platnosti.
- Dokumenty: Přehled dokumentů či odkazů na webové stránky s možností zobrazení či stažení.
- Souhlasy: Odsouhlasení souhlasů vytvořených klubem, včetně možnosti odvolání.
- Bazar: Možnost nabídnout nevyužívané sportovní vybavení ostatním členům.
- Zdravotní prohlídky: Evidence zdravotních prohlídek s možností odevzdání, kontrola platnosti.

Všechny informace naleznete na webu esports.cz/kis

The official Jude Bellingham app has arrived.  
Step into the world of Jude Bellingham like never before with his brand-new, free official app.  

Whether you're a lifelong fan or just discovering Jude’s journey, this app brings you exclusive behind-the-scenes content, real-time match updates, and in-game stats straight from the pitch.  

Key features: 
•	Exclusive content – Access behind-the-scenes footage of Jude’s life away from the spotlight.  
•	Matches - Receive real-time match updates, Jude’s upcoming fixtures and in-game stats. 
•	Partnerships – Discover Jude’s latest brand collabs and shop his official merchandise all in one place. 
•	Videos – View interviews, training clips and personal moments you won’t find anywhere else. 
•	Jude’s Journey – Relive the highlights, key milestones and unforgettable moments of Jude’s career so far. 
•	Multi-language – Enjoy a seamless experience in your preferred language – choose from English, French, German, Spanish and Brazilian Portuguese. 

Wherever you are in the world, the Jude Bellingham app puts you at the heart of his story.  

Download now and stay connected to every moment.

Darts Scorer App Score Counter 2025 is designed for darts lovers.
With this app you can easily count scores while playing X01 and Cricket darts games with your friends. App calculates all points, statistics and automatically determines the winner. In the application you can choose players, the number of Legs and Sets, the game mode and the number of scores 301, 501. It is also possible to save games and play them later. You don't need to buy a special Scoreboard or scorekeeper, everything is available in your phone. Download and track game results with this easy-to-use and free darts calculator.

Experience Formula 1 like never before with our official app!

Your one-stop hub keeps you updated with the latest F1 news, thrilling highlights, race results, action-packed videos, real-time results and detailed schedules.

Stay ahead of the curve with:
•	The latest F1 news and expert technical analysis
•	Race weekend schedules and real-time results
•	Manage your F1 Fantasy team 
•	Free Leaderboard with live timings
•	Driver and conductor standings 

For F1 TV Access® subscribers, unlock a world of exclusive content including:
•	Live telemetry data and session insights, including comprehensive tyre Information, lap times, speed and DRS.
•	Real-time interactive Driver Tracker Maps
•	Live English audio commentary
•	Listen to the drama unfold with the best of Team Radio

Download now for your ultimate companion into the world of Formula 1.

How to subscribe to F1® TV

F1® TV puts you in the driving seat – with race highlights, live timing and live streaming (available only in certain countries). You can subscribe to F1® TV with an annual or monthly subscription. 

Subscriptions renew automatically, unless you turn off auto-renew at least 24 hours beforehand. You can turn off auto-renew at any time through your iTunes account.

Terms of use: https://account.formula1.com/#/en/terms-of-use
Subscription terms and conditions: https://account.formula1.com/#/en/subscription-terms
Privacy policy: https://account.formula1.com/#/en/privacy-policy

Stay ahead of every sporting moment with live scores, stats, and schedules. Follow the biggest leagues in the world, including the Premier League, Champions League, La Liga, Serie A, Bundesliga, Brasileirão Série A, and Ligue 1. Track every phase of the NBA, EuroLeague, NCAA, and top tennis tournaments like Wimbledon, Roland Garros, US Open, Australian Open, and the ATP & WTA Tours—all in one app.

Experience the Ultimate Live Score App—Sofascore! Your go-to destination for all scores, sports statistics, and a world of sports excitement! Whether you are a passionate sports fan or a serious football fantasy manager, we have everything, from simple live scores to deep statistics and detailed player analysis. We cover 25 sports (from football and tennis to darts and cricket) and more than 5,000 leagues and tournaments. With the Sofascore app, you won’t miss a thing!

Download Sofascore now and never miss another moment in sports! 

Why choose Sofascore?

• Fast & Precise: Instant notifications, flash scores, and results – enjoy the fastest updates on the planet
• Top Leagues: Stay atop elite competitions with live scores and fixtures & find a complete season overview
• Player Insights: Detailed stats on goals, player performances, and sports events – be the first to know
• Comprehensive Coverage: Dive into all the live scores and fixtures from top leagues and tournaments worldwide

Explore Extensive Sports Features:

• Statistical Ratings: Access over 300 statistics used by pros, news sites, and analysts for a comprehensive view
• Attribute Overview: Visualize key player attributes to gauge their completeness quickly
• Attack Momentum: Track match dynamics and team pressure intensity with a unique graph
• Box Score & ShotMap: Get the details of every match—every point, assist, and shooting pattern
• Power Graph: Witness the flow of matches, showcasing the dominance level of the winning player
• Heatmap: Visualize player movements on the pitch for every match and the entire season
• Head-to-Head: Compare teams and players head-to-head, analyzing their performance history and rivalry

Discover a wide range of sports, leagues and tournaments in the Sofascore live score app:

• Football - Premier League, UEFA Champions League, UEFA Europa League, Bundesliga, LaLiga, Serie A, Ligue 1, Brasileirão Série A, UEFA European Championshio (EURO), FIFA World Cup
• Basketball - NBA, EuroLeague, FIBA World Cup, Stoiximan Basket League, Serie A, Liga ACB
• Tennis - ATP Tour, WTA Tour, Grand Slams (Australian Open, French Open, Wimbledon, US Open), Davis Cup
• Table Tennis - ITTF World Table Tennis Championships, Table Tennis World Cup
• Ice Hockey - NHL, KHL, IIHF World Championship
• eSports - LoL, Dota 2, CS:GO 2
• Handball - IHF World Handball Championship, Bundesliga, EHF Champions League
• Volleyball - FIVB Volleyball World Championship, Nations League, Champions League
• Baseball - MLB, LMB, Pro Yakyu - NPB
• American Football - NFL, NCAA
• MMA - UFC, Bellator, KSW, Rizin, PFL
• Motorsport - Formula 1, NASCAR, MotoGP, WRC
• Cricket - ICC World Cup, Indian Premier League (IPL)

and the rest of the sports we cover - Rugby, Darts, Snooker, Futsal, Minifootball, Badminton, Aussie Rules, Beach Volleyball, Water polo, Cycling, Floorball, Bandy.

Privacy policy: https://www.sofascore.com/privacy-policy
Terms of use: https://www.sofascore.com/terms-and-conditions

developer: Shenzhen United Power Technology Co., Ltd.
description:
****Hryfine bracelets are non-medical devices. The measurement data and results are for reference only, not for diagnosis and treatment. * * * * *

Special Reminder: APP data is for reference only and is not used as a medical diagnosis. You should consult your doctor before using APP and making any medical decisions.

1, Home Sports: record your exercise data, set exercise goals and calculate whether the goal is achieved, steps, distance, calorie consumption, etc.;

2. Sleep monitoring: it can record the sleep duration and sleep quality in the set period, and count the duration of deep sleep, light sleep and awake, so that you can improve the sleep quality;

3. When the phone searches for the bracelet, the bracelet vibrates. Find the phone through the bracelet, phone vibration and ring reminder, in case of loss.

4. It can remind the user of important information such as call, SMS, WeChat and so on when connecting with the bracelet, to prevent missing important information, etc.;

5. Set an intelligent alarm clock for the bracelet to remind you of sitting for a long time. The bracelet vibrates to remind you to reduce the problems caused by sitting for a long time

6, Remote control photography mode, anytime and anywhere to record the beautiful moment

7, statistics your daily, monthly, weekly exercise, sleep, data display at a glance

8. You can set the bracelet to turn the wrist to light up the screen and light up the screen easily

9. Sports data report: make statistics of your sports data and average data in the last 30 days, as well as your sports standards in the last seven days, and generate reports for easy viewing of sports trends

S pomocou Paysy máte klubové členské príspevky vyriešené bez starostí. Pomáhame viac ako 350 organizáciám v 25 rôznych športových odvetviach mať klubové financie pod kontrolou. Okrem platieb, vďaka mnohým ďalším funkciám, Paysy pomáha efektívne riadiť klub vo viacerých oblastiach.

Aplikácia je určená pre členov organizácií, ktorý využávajú systém Paysy pre správu svojej organizácie.

Člen v aplikácií nájde:
 
- dokonalý prehľad o svojich platbách 
- kalendár tréningov a dochádzku
- komunikačné centrum
- notifikácie z organizácie
- základné informácie, ktoré si o ňom organizácia eviduje
- možnosť vygenerovať podklady pre príspevok na športovú činnosť od zamestnávateľa

With the EOS platform, you can solve all your club communication, paperwork, and website in one go. The mobile app then makes life easier for the members themselves, their parents and coaches. Say no to chaos in messengers. Communicate with your teams easily.

- notifications, all important information at hand
- communication – clear messages and comments on team walls
- events – calendars, excuse notes, attendance
- payments – QR codes, card payments, proofs of payment
- documents – sharing and submitting
- consents – electronic solution for GDPR

How to add your club to the app? First, your club needs to sign up for the EOS platform (www.eosclub.app). You can then find the club by location and log into it the same way as into the web version. You can also add your club using a QR or numeric code which you can also find in the web version of the platform: click your avatar on the top right > Mobile application.

The official app for Globe Soccer Awards.
Celebrities and prestigious nominees from the football world will once again attend the yearly event.

Also, don’t forget to tune in for the streaming video, live from the Awards gala.

The official app allows to:
- Vote for your favourite football stars
- Predict scores from the major leagues
- Keep track of the nominees and winners
- Get directions to the Event venue
- Explore the photo gallery and previous editions' Awards

Experience the thrill of Formula 1® with F1 TV Access. Relive race archives, enjoy exclusive shows, and dive into detailed data, all from your favorite devices.

With F1 TV Access, you can:
•        Get full exclusive access to Live Timing Data, Maps and Analysis
•        Watch F1 shows and documentaries
•        Explore over 2000 hours of historic race archives
•        Enjoy a premium ad-free experience 

For more information on F1 TV content available in your country please visit the F1 website.

For help with F1TV, please visit: https://support.f1.tv/s/?language=en_US

If you subscribe via iTunes:
Payment will be charged to your iTunes account at confirmation of purchase. Subscriptions automatically renew unless auto-renew is turned off at least 24-hours before the end of the current billing period. Account will be charged for renewal within 24 hours prior to the end of the current period at the rate of the selected plan.
Subscriptions and auto-renewal may be managed by going to the user's Account Settings after purchase.

Terms of use: https://account.formula1.com/#/en/f1-apps-terms-of-use
Privacy policy: https://account.formula1.com/#/en/privacy-policy

Lusail Tickets is a secure mobile ticketing application built on top of blockchain technology. Its’ aim is to upgrade security, reduce fraud, and digitalize your tickets purchase processes.
With Lusail Tickets, you can:
- Download your tickets instantly on your smartphone, and keep them with you anywhere you go.
- Transfer tickets to your friends or family members through the ticket transfer option using only their phone numbers. The transfer takes only few seconds.
- Access the event using your digitalized tickets in a frictionless way by just presenting your QR code to the access control point.

MMA Finds unites the global fight world in one powerful platform.


For the first time, fans, fighters, coaches, managers and promoters come together in a single place to shape the future of MMA.


For Fans

Suggest the matchups you want to see, join live chats during fight nights, and enjoy exclusive content.


For Fighters, Coaches & Managers
Secure matchups in seconds, build and highlight your profiles, and manage every opportunity without endless calls or scattered messages.


For Promoters
Fill cards faster, discover new talent, and unlock opportunities to grow.


Whether you fight, manage, promote or simply love the sport, MMA Finds brings the entire fight community together in one place.

Get ready to take your fut gaming experience to the next level with PACFUT! Our latest season is packed with exciting game modes that will challenge you and help you build the ultimate squad.

YOUR #AbuDhabiGP ESSENTIALS - ALL IN ONE APP! 
The #AbuDhabiGP App is a one-stop-shop guide designed to gear you up for the highly-anticipated Formula 1 Etihad Airways Abu Dhabi Grand Prix 2025. The app will provide you with all you need to plan your race weekend with confidence both on and off the track. Get ready to get Race-Ready! 


Key functionality includes:
• Access your ticket on the app ready to scan on entry to the circuit
• Share tickets with friends and family with ease!
• Browse and explore all the Entertainment areas and add events to favourites
• Receive notifications about on-track & off-track events, including the After-Race concerts
• Check out what other attractions and experiences are included with your ticket
• The #AbuDhabiGP is available in both English and Arabic

Target DartCounter is the world’s biggest darts scorer app for keeping track of all your scores. Play x01 games, Cricket, Around the Clock and several other training games.
Play online against your friends or challenge the computer dartbot.
In the x01 games you will hear the voice of MasterCaller Ray Martin who will announce your name and all your scores.

Register or log in and all your games will be saved.
Play with multiple players with a DartCounter account and the whole game will be saved in both accounts.

IN-APP PURCHASES 
The app offers one in-app purchases; "Ultimate Yearly" and "Ultimate Monthly". These are annual  and monthly auto renewable subscription which gives you access to more features and statistics to improve your darts skills.

When you own this subscription you will get the newest gameplays earlier than the users without the subscription. Also, we will keep adding more Ultimate features in the future updates to make the usage easier, more detailed and even more fun!

GENERAL PAYMENT INFORMATION
• Payment will be charged to iTunes Account at confirmation of purchase
• Subscription automatically renews unless auto-renew is turned off at least 24-hours before the end of the current period
• Account will be charged for renewal within 24-hours prior to the end of the current period, and identify the cost of the renewal
• Subscriptions may be managed by the user and auto-renewal may be turned off by going to the user's Account Settings after purchase


PRICING
The Ultimate Yearly subscription costs $34.99 USD each year, the Ultimate Monthly subscription costs $4.99 USD each year. This will be automatically converted to your own currency by iTunes. For more information about the annual payment or how to cancel auto renewing, read "Payment & Cancellation".


PAYMENT & CANCELLATION
The payment will be charged to your iTunes account at confirmation of purchase.

24 hours before the end of each subscription period (one year) you'll automatically be charged the same amount as you've paid for the initial purchase.
After renewing, your subscription will be valid for another year.

You can turn off auto-renew at any time from your iTunes/App Store account settings; 
you must do so at least 24 hours before the end of the current subscription period to avoid being billed for the next cycle.

Sportity is a Sport Event Information Distribution App for all kinds of sport events. The app helps organisers to distribute event related information to all the participants quickly and efficiently.

Participants can be divided into different categories so that they receive information only relevant to them. For example, Media will have its own category for their specific needs (media shuttle schedule, press center opening times etc). The organising committee will have its own information available through the app and teams all the information relevant for them. In addition to specific information, all users can have results, starting times etc available through the app.

Participants need to download the app and enter a password which will take them directly to the information according to their profile. The password will be made available from the organiser.

The organiser needs to contact Sportity Ltd for the use of the app.

Organizuj svoje hry - Vytvor skupinu, pozvi priateľov, sleduj odpovede a rozdeľ hráčov do tímov. Scorentino ti poskytne predikcie na základe tvojich predchádzajúcich hier, takže budeš vždy pripravený.

Nájdi športových partnerov - Spoj sa s ostatnými športovcami vo svojom okolí, nájdi si partnerov na rôzne športy a vytvor si tím.

Rezervuj športoviská - Rýchlo a jednoducho rezervuj športoviská vo svojom okolí priamo cez aplikáciu. Už žiadne zbytočné telefonáty a čakanie.

Plánuj a organizuj športové aktivity - Vytváraj tímy, organizuj ligy, závody a udalosti všetko na jednom mieste. Scorentino ti ušetrí čas a energiu pri organizovaní.

Pripoj sa k aktívnej komunite - Spoznaj nových ľudí, zdieľaj svoje zážitky a motivuj sa k lepším výkonom spolu s ďalšími športovcami.

Rezervuj služby - Objavuj a rezervuj služby trénerov a masérov vo svojom okolí. Scorentino ti pomôže nájsť tie najlepšie služby pre tvoj športový výkon.

Scorentino je tu, aby ti pomohlo ušetriť čas, nájsť športoviská, organizovať aktivity a zlepšiť tvoje športové výkony. Stiahni si Scorentino ešte dnes a zaži šport na úplne novej úrovni.

Scorentino (často hľadané aj ako Scoorentino, scoorentino alebo Skorentino a skoorentino) je appka, kde si nájdeš spoluhráčov na futbal, tenis a iné športy...

The 433 app is the ultimate football experience for every football lover. Whether you want to keep track of your team’s big match, stay up to date with all the latest news, kick back and watch some epic viral videos or simply test your footy knowledge with a variety of games… We’ve got you covered. Welcome to the home of football.


MATCH CENTRE
Find everything you need on matchday – fixtures, results, match stats, live line-ups – and get notifications when your teams score. Which team dominated possession? Who had the highest xG? How many of their shots were on target? How many yellow cards did the referee give? It’s all there, and more. 


PREDICTIONS
Think you ‘know ball’ better than your friends? Here’s your chance to prove it! Create leaderboards with your friends and go head-to-head in daily predictions of matches from across the world. Enter into the general leaderboards and compete against all 433 users, with the chance to win prizes.


WALLPAPERS
Need a new football background for your phone? This is the app for you. Wallpapers are released every week, covering all the biggest players, clubs and national sides.


QUIZZES
Put your football knowledge to the test with a series of quizzes, interactive games and brain teasers. Want to find out who knows more about football: You or your friends? You can! Add your friends, complete quizzes, and keep track of each other’s ‘ball knowledge’ with leaderboards.


NEWS
Stay on top of the news and never miss any breaking stories coming out of your favourite clubs and leagues. Keep track of your team’s transfer developments, injury updates, unmissable quotes and reactions from across the football world. Be the first to find out about trending stories or when a transfer is nearing that all important ‘Here we go!’


VIRALS
Want to see goals, saves, moments from games across the world? Want to feel the game from the fan’s perspective? Or do you just want to see some funny moments from famous players and coaches? Then look no further. Find daily uploads of viral moments from across the beautiful game!
